Download and Upload the Code¶

Download the Code

Download the relevant code from the link below.

  • SunFounder Pico-4wd Car Code

  • Or check out the code at Pico-4wd Car - GitHub

Upload the Libraries to Pico¶

Before using Pico-4wd Car, you need to save its related libraries in Raspberry Pi Pico.

  1. Open Thonny IDE, in the top navigation bar, click View -> Files.

  2. Switch the path to the folder where you downloaded the code package before, and then go to the pico_4wd_car/libs folder.

  3. Plug the Pico into your computer with a micro USB cable and click on the “MicroPython (Raspberry Pi Pico)” interpreter in the bottom right corner.

  4. Then the drive Raspberry Pi Pico/ will appear, and the next thing we need to do is to upload the library files to this drive.

  5. Select these 3 files, right-click and click Upload to, it will take a while to upload.

  6. Now you will see the files you just uploaded inside your drive Raspberry Pi Pico.
